course_title: Special Topics in History: English Legal History
class_notes:
This course originates in the Law School.  Law School classes begin 8/14/2023 which is earlier than LGS and ECAS classes.
Final Exam: 12/06/2023 from 09:00am to 01:00pm


This course covers English law from the Norman Conquest to the 18th century, with an emphasis on the development of constitutional law, and using Magna Carta as the central document.
sections: Class Nbr: 6686, Section #: 7, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 2-3:30p, Instructor: A. Volokh, Status: Open
